description:

	Dangerous calls:
	- success = paidUser.send(amount) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928_3round.sol#199)
